downloadTitle: Microsoft Mobility and Security for Enterprise Architects
downloadDescription: Get an overview of mobility and security with Microsoft cloud services and platforms.
detailsSection: Microsoft provides broad support for mobile productivity with support for applications and rich features for controlling access to your organization's assets. Get an overview of Microsoft mobile apps for business, how to develop your own mobile apps, mobile access to on-prem applications, cloud security, and more.
systemRequirementsSection:
This poster is available in Visio (VSD or VSDX) and PDF versions in 11x17 (tabloid) format for easy printing. 

You will need Microsoft Visio or the Microsoft Visio 2016 Viewer (https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=51188) for the Visio version. 

You will need the Adobe Acrobat reader for the PDF version.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
